,'SYSTEM' ,'20240215' ,'SYSTEM' ,'20240215' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.HOSM_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' WHEN A.HOSM_UPDT_DATE > B.HOSM_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN CATBHOSM B ON B.HOSM_CORP_CODE = A.HOSM_CORP_CODE AND B.HOSM_STND_GUBN = A.HOSM_STND_GUBN AND B.HOSM_STND_DEGR = A.HOSM_STND_DEGR AND B.HOSM_MATL_SEQ0 = A.HOSM_MATL_SEQ0 AND B.HOSM_MATL_GUBN = A.HOSM_MATL_GUBN

UPDATE CATBHOSM SET HOSM_HOSE_CODE = #hosm_hose_code# ,HOSM_INJT_CODE = #hosm_injt_code# ,HOSM_SHAP_CODE = #hosm_shap_code# ,HOSM_IN00_CODE = #hosm_in00_code# ,HOSM_SPNG_YN = #hosm_spng_yn# ,HOSM_BARC_CODE = #hosm_barc_code# ,HOSM_NET0_MIN0 = #hosm_net0_min0# ,HOSM_NET0_MAX0 = #hosm_net0_max0# ,HOSM_MATL_NAME = #hosm_matl_name# ,HOSM_MATL_PRIC = #hosm_matl_pric# ,HOSM_MATL_UNIT = #hosm_matl_unit# ,HOSM_USE0_WEGT = #hosm_use0_wegt# ,HOSM_USE0_COEF1 = #hosm_use0_coef1# ,HOSM_APPL_GUBN = #hosm_appl_gubn# ,HOSM_REMK = #hosm_remk# ,HOSM_UPDT_CMAN = #hosm_updt_cman# ,HOSM_UPDT_DATE = #hosm_updt_date# WHERE HOSM_CORP_CODE = #hosm_corp_code# AND HOSM_STND_GUBN = #hosm_stnd_gubn# AND HOSM_STND_DEGR = #hosm_stnd_degr# AND HOSM_MATL_SEQ0 = #hosm_matl_seq0# AND HOSM_MATL_GUBN = #hosm_matl_gubn#
